ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:13:16 [Issue ID 4000-107582] urn:comicvine:4000-107582 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 04:11:54. [Issue ID 55751]
ComicInfo.Summary: Maul learns on the news that someone close to him has been injured by Mighty Man of Freak Force. Maul visits the hospital to see his friend when he finds Mighty Man there as well. Maul immediately attacks Mighty Man and his teammates arrive to help him out. Meanwhile, WildC.A.T.s also arrive and a large battle ensues. The Savage Dragon arrives to calm things down and Maul's friend tells Maul how it wasn't Mighty Man's fault that she was injured. The two teams decide to be amicable and even go on vacation together.
